title: Issue with client or connection issue
body:
I joined a game like normal and everything seemed fine, then at about the 20s mark, my character stopped responding to commands and everything else on the battleground froze like I was lagging or disconnected, but it was very sudden and the disconnect notice never came up on screen. I was still connected to the internet perfectly fine and loaded pages at the normal speed. I exited the game client and reconnected but again everything was frozen as soon as I had reloaded. This happened one more time, then I decided to reset the all of LoL, log in again and bam it works fine. 

Nothing like this has ever happened to me before. It was very weird. another team mate was also disconnected from the games launch, which made me suspect foul play, or a server side error or such.

Anyhow, I thought I would what happened here.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Has this occurred to you since? If not then I don't think we have to worry about it. However if it is a constant issue let me know and we can work together on a solution.
